title: minerjones
author: minerjones
created_time: October 03, 2022, 11:00:47 PMLast edit: October 03, 2022, 11:21:36 PM by minerjones
content: 2014 Casascius St.Petersburg Bitcoin Bowl coin, silver/gilt 1oz**Coin is being left in its original state in the slab that it came in. Winner can decide if they want to change it to a different capsule or get graded. The toning does not affect the grade of the coin****Both pictures were taken with no capsule on the coin**STARTING BID: 0.0001BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: OCTOBER 8th, 2022, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending timeIf within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the that lot from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference

comments.author: Spokanistan51
comments.body: Quote from: TheNovemberMan on October 05, 2022, 07:30:03 PMHow much do you think the ring would be worth?I actually owned an original player ring and have sold it. It was an amazing ring for sure, regret getting rid of it We may never see one surface again as the rings are specific to the player, and most do not give them up.
